title: Organizational Change and Learning: Exploring Digital Transformation Cases

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of social organization theory and general understanding of digital technology changes
context.additional_context: Designing Activities Feasible in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments, Emphasizing Problem-Solving Skills Through Real-World Case Analysis

learning_goals: Can identify core elements of organizational change by analyzing digital transformation cases in real public institutions
Can explain tension relationships within organizations under uncertainty from a social perspective (commitment conflict)
Can derive actionable proposals for organizational continuous change directions through collaborative problem-solving processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
